nodes.text: The Opportunity was a EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate that served under the banner of Jinata Security during the Cold War. The vessel was eventually disabled above Athulla by Inferno Squad while carrying out Project Resurrection.
The Opportunity sported the colors and symbol of Jinata Security on its hull.

The Opportunity and her GR-75 medium transport escort ships were under the command of Leema Kai and were involved in the abduction of families as part of Project Resurrection. During a mission to Athulla undertaken by Inferno Squad on board the Corvus, they encountered the Opportunity and her escort ships. Following a dogfight that resulted in the Opportunity's engines being destroyed and the destruction of all other J-Sec ships, as well as the death of Kai, the crew of the Opportunity surrendered, and gave Inferno Squad all of the information they knew.
